thread.title: Odisha Administrative Services exams: Sanyasi Behera comes first among eight visually impaired candidates to clear exam
thread.title_full: Odisha Administrative Services exams: Sanyasi Behera comes first among eight visually impaired candidates to clear exam - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: Odisha Administrative Services exams: Sanyasi Behera comes first among eight visually impaired candidates to clear exam
text:
Sanyasi Behera came first among the visually impaired candidates who qualified in the exams. (ANI) As the Odisha Public Service Commission (OPSC) declared its results for the Odisha Civil Services preliminary examination on February 17, Sanyasi Behera came first among the visually impaired candidates who qualified in the exams. Other than Sanyasi, eight other candidates qualified in the preliminary exams to make it to the final list.
Delighted with the result, overwhelmed Sanyasi expressed his happiness and pride and stated that he had crossed all attitudinal and legal barriers to clear the exam and participate in the decission making process. Sanyasi got an all Odisha rank of 20 in the exams.
